
\beginhymn Salve festa dies.

\def\beginverse{\begingroup
                       \def\\{\mycr}
                       \pretolerance=10000
                       \raggedright
                       \parskip=5pt
                       \parindent10mm
                       \vskip-\parskip
                       \itlyrics}
\def\endverse{\endgroup}

\setgregorian1
\setclef14
\nosolesmescustos
\musicindent14mm
\raisesong3\Internote
\initiumgregorianum
\musicinitial{IV.}{S}%
\sgn {}{A}{lv}\punctum L\spatiumparvum\pes LN\egn
\sgn {}e{}\punctum L\egn
\spatium
\sgn f{e}s\engl{\idx{Hail festal day},}\pes Na\egn
\sgn ta{}\clivis ML\egn
\spatium
\sgn di-\punctum K\egn
\sgn {}e{s,}\episem N1\punctum L\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
\sgn t{o}-\punctum N\egn
\sgn to{}\pes ac\egn
\spatium
\sgn ven\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}er\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}{\'a}b\engl{hallowed forever;}\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}i-\punctum N\egn
\sgn lis\punctum M\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}{\ae}v\pes KL\egn
\sgn {}o,\punctum L\augmentum L\egn
\spatium
\divisiominor
\spatium
\sgn {Qu}a{}\engl{On which ~ ~}\punctum M\egn
\spatium
\custos L
\lineaproxima
\sgn D{e}-\punctum L\egn
\sgn {}us\punctum K\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}in\engl{God defeats hell}\punctum M\egn
\sgn f{\'e}{rn}\clivis aN\egn
\sgn {}um\episem N2\clivis LK\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
\sgn v{i}-\punctum M\egn
\sgn cit\punctum N\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}et\punctum a\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}{a}s\engl{and seizes heaven.}\punctum N\egn
\sgn {tr}a{}\punctum M\egn
\spatium
\sgn t{e}n\pes KL\egn
\sgn {}et\punctum L\augmentum L\egn
\Finisgregoriana
